1.text: Get at least 1 scorecard for each player.

2.text: Explain to everyone how the game's letter-number combinations work.

3.text: Choose a player to be the caller.

4.text: Pass out scorecards to all the players.

5.text: Give each player a pile of Bingo chips.

6.text: Place a chip on the square in the center of your scorecard.

7.text: Give the caller the letters and numbers they'll call out in the game.

8.text: Have the caller read out a letter-number combination.

9.text: Place a chip on your scorecard if you have that letter and number.

10.text: Continue playing until someone gets 5 chips in a row on their scorecard.

11.text: Shout "Bingo” if you get 5 squares in a row.

12.text: Have everyone clear their scorecards after someone wins.

13.text: Mix up all the letter-number combinations for the next game.
